metadata.name: Magic Items Expansion Pack 2
metadata.description: Innovative magical artifacts with unique properties

enchanted_containers.text: Bottle that captures and stores specific sounds to be released later
Basket that multiplies any food placed inside it, but only at midnight
Pouch that contains an entire meadow accessible by reaching inside
Jar that preserves memories as swirling colored mists
Box that translates anything placed inside it into another language

illuminating_objects.text: Candle that burns with the color of its holder's current emotion
Lamp that casts shadows of events happening far away
Crystal that glows brighter the more truths are spoken near it
Torch that reveals hidden writing on any surface it illuminates
Firefly lantern that guides the holder to whatever they're seeking

protective_items.text: Shield that absorbs insults and converts them to strength in battle
Bracelet that warns of danger by growing cold against the skin
Scarf that becomes as hard as steel when someone tries to harm the wearer
Amulet that creates a duplicate of the wearer to confuse attackers
Ring that makes the wearer forgettable to anyone with ill intentions

communication_devices.text: Conch shell that carries messages across vast distances when whispered into
Pair of books where writing in one appears in the other
Earrings that allow the wearer to understand any spoken language
Pendant that translates animal speech when held to the ear
Mirror that shows the face of whoever is thinking about the user

botanical_magic.text: Seeds that grow plants shaped like meaningful objects from the planter's life
Flower that blooms with petals showing scenes from the past
Thorn that, when pricked, causes the victim to speak only in rhymes
Leaf that never withers and can be used as a map to anywhere once visited
Fruit that tastes like the eater's happiest memory

liquid_enchantments.text: Vial of water that can dissolve lies when sprinkled on written words
Ink that changes color to reflect the truth of what's written with it
Oil that makes objects weightless when applied
Perfume that makes the wearer appear as whoever the observer most trusts
Elixir that allows the drinker to understand the language of objects

crafting_tools.text: Needle that can sew emotions into garments, affecting whoever wears them
Hammer that builds structures according to the wielder's thoughts
Scissors that cut doorways between locations when used on empty air
Chisel that reveals the true form hidden within any material
Loom shuttle that weaves patterns predicting future events
